text: Go to microsoft.com  On the right, click downloads.  Now click downloads & trials on the top left in the box.  A little box will open up saying. "all categories" change this to whatever but it is not needed. Type in the box beside it "halo"  Now it should give you a list of programs. If you have windows xp, click the first download. Hit download.  Now install.  No register needed! just go to profiles like you would on your xbox and make a profile. Click multiplayer and then click internet. Now click refresh and find a room you want to join and join it!
